page.title: 11TEBAY TROUT FISHERY
page.content: The Fishery is run by MR & MRS Malinder they turned to the idea because trout dieing in rivers & seas so he thought he'd make a profit. Admission for adults Â£2.50 juniors Â£2.00 fish cost Â£1.25 per lb.heaviest fish weight 7lb you can hire rods, tackle & bait.They have only \tonne of fish in a tank.It opens at 0900 & closes at 1800.If you catch the heaviest weight fish you can keep it . The pool measures 37 feet across.In the holidays it is busy but during the week it just ticks over.One person caught 7 fish in 4 hours then paid for another go & caught a prize winner . Kerry Francis & Michael Braithwaite
